'''Down to Dodge''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Domains and Spiral Abyss: Series I]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete [[Spiral Abyss]] 2-3 without taking any DMG.

==Notes==
*Using talents that reduce the characters' HP does not count as taking damage.
*It is possible to earn the Tier 2 and Tier 3 achievements first. However, the player will be unable to claim the rewards before completing the preceding achievements.
